items_mt_mobile }}px; } .timeline-item-{{ section.id }} { display: grid; gap: {{ item_gap_mobile }}px; } .timeline-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) { margin-top: {{ item_mt_mobile }}px; } .timeline-images-wrapper-{{ section.id }} { position: relative; min-width: 0; width: 100%; order: 1; } .timeline-image-{{ section.id }} { overflow: hidden; position: relative; box-sizing: border-box; .timeline-title-{{ section.id }} { margin: 0; display: block; width: 100%; text-align: {{ item_heading_align_mobile }}; font-size: {{ item_heading_size_mobile }}px; color: {{ item_heading_color }}; background: trasparent; background: {{ arrow_bg_color }}; align-items: center; justify-content: center; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; cursor: pointer; -webkit-appearance: none; box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); } .timeline-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} { left: 10px !important; } .timeline-btn-next-{{ section.id }} { right: 10px !important; } .timeline-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} svg, arrow_border_hover_color }}; background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }}; } .timeline-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path, .timeline-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path { fill: {{ arrow_hover_color }}; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s; } .timeline-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled, .timeline-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled { opacity: 0; } section.id }} { grid-template-columns: 40% 60%; gap: {{ item_gap }}px; align-items: start; } .timeline-content-{{ section.id }} { padding-left: 0; } .timeline-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) { margin-top: {{ item_mt }}px; } .timeline-item-{{ section.id }}:nth-child(even) { padding-right: 10%; } .timeline-item-{{ section.id }}:nth-child(odd) { padding-left: 10%; } .timeline-title-{{ section.id }} { text-align: {{ item_heading_align }}; font-size: {{ item_heading_size }}px; } .timeline-date-{{ section.id }} { margin-top: {{ date_mt }}px; text-align: {{ date_align }}; font-size: {{
